title: S-Alkylated quinazolin-4(3H)-ones as dual EGFR/VEGFR-2 kinases inhibitors: design, synthesis, anticancer evaluation and docking study
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26325-26339
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04828H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Samar S. Tawfik, Abdelrahman Hamdi, Ahmed R. Ali, Abdullah A. Elgazar, Hamed W. El-Shafey, Adel S. El-Azab, Ahmed H. Bakheit, Mohamed M. Hefnawy, Hazem A. Ghabbour, Alaa A.-M. Abdel-Aziz
Novel quinazolin-4(3H)-ones 4–27 were synthesized. Compounds 4, 11, and 20 showed potential anti-tumour activities. 4, 11, and 20 blocked EGFR/VEGFR-2 and triggered apoptosis. Compound 4 showed the most potent activity against EGFR/VEGFR-2.
